name: Super Dodge Ball: Neo Geo
overview: A sequel to the original Super Dodge Ball and features characters from Technōs Japan's Kunio-kun series. It was also the final game developed by Technōs before the company went out of business. While the game was never officially distributed in Japan, since only a Western version was produced, the game's language will be set to Japanese when played on a Japanese Neo-Geo motherboard.
